member.name: T:JetBrains.dotCover.SignatureDefinitions.LambdaInfo
member.summary: Data used to identify lambda within some scope (type, method or other lambda).

member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.SignatureDefinitions.LambdaInfo.Index
member.summary: Index of lambda in the list of all lambdas from current scope that have the same signature. If navigation should search through all lambdas at the current level, the value must be -1.

member.name: P:JetBrains.dotCover.SignatureDefinitions.ClassTypeSignature.GenericArguments
member.summary: Generic arguments of the type. Returns empty enumeration if no type has no parameters
